ai-tika-abh08t20:3_0: From this day forth they wake up.
ai-tika-abh08t20:5_0: of stress, weariness, and fever, they totally given up the state of conditioned phenomena, attachment to rebirth, and choices.
ai-tika-abh08t20:6_0: For fear, terror, and goosebumps, boiled goods, providing appearance, irrigation, and comfort of the Dhamma: that leads to peace, insight, awakening, and extinguishment.
ai-tika-abh08t20:6_1: All the knowledges that arise from the truth, with all they expect to be experienced.
ai-tika-abh08t20:8_0: Thus they lived on the spiritual life;
ai-tika-abh08t20:9_0: The Book of the practice of purification of knowledge and vision is finished.
ai-tika-abh08t20:10_0: The group of one hundred on the other.
